scripts.build:component: ng build --output-hashing none --configuration production && node concat-script.js
scripts.predeploy: git add . && git commit -m fix && git status || true
scripts.deploy: ng build --output-hashing none --configuration production && node concat-script.js || true
scripts.postdeploy: cp custom-elements/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent.js /home/crsepulv/clientes/ubiqq/cdn/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/js/ && cp custom-elements/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent.css /home/crsepulv/clientes/ubiqq/cdn/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/css/ && cp dist/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/*.js /home/crsepulv/clientes/ubiqq/cdn/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/js/ && cp dist/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/*.css /home/crsepulv/clientes/ubiqq/cdn/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/css/ && https://github.com/crsepulv/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent.git && synccustomer ubiqq && clearcloudfront /cdn/ubiqq-ai-webcomponent/*
